description.p: Defines the number of columns to display in the Grid before alternating to the odd column color.

discussion.p: When *[ui:Alternate Column Shading]* is enabled, the *[ui:Even column band size]* property is shown. This property defines the number of column to display using the even column color before alternating to the odd column color. The even column color is the default background color for columns in a Grid.
See [Alternate Column Shading] for more information about customizing the column colors.
